… XL compiler

The flag -qzerosize is redundant, as the IBM XL compiler should set this flag
by default in lib/spack/spack/compilers/xl*.py.
However, at this time the default flag appears to be ignore by spack.
Hence, I am setting it in the package file as well, as it has no negative
effect if set twice.
title: netlib-lapack: Update package file for netlib-lapack to work with IBM…
